settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

settings.label: Cart Timer Minute
settings.info: Example: 1200 second left = 20 minutes left

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://docs.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).
Although you will be able to display prices on your storefront in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: USD CAD INR GBP AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.label: Page To Display
settings.info: If no page is selected, no default message will display.

settings.label: Collection To Display
settings.info: If no collection is selected, no products will display.

settings.content: If no page is selected, a default "404 Page Custom Settings" will display.

settings.label: 404 Title
settings.info: 404 page title, a default "Whoops! We can't find the page you requested (sorry)..." will display.

settings.label: 404 Sub Title
settings.info: 404 page sub title.

settings.label: URL Type Help Text
settings.info: 404 page help text for URL type mistake, default "If you typed in a URL... make sure the spelling, cApitALiZaTiOn, and punctuation are correct. Then try reloading the page." will display.

settings.label: Speak To Help Text
settings.info: 404 page help text for Speak to our exper, default "Speak to one of our ridiculously helpful Experts and they'll scour our product list for what you need (even if it's not on our website)." will display.

settings.content: If no results are found, a default "No Results Found" message will display.

settings.label: Search Title
settings.info: No Results page title, a default "Whoops! We can't find the page you requested (sorry)..." will display.

settings.label: Search Sub Title
settings.info: Search page sub title.

settings.label: URL Type Help Text
settings.info: No Results page help text for URL type mistake, default "If you typed in a URL... make sure the spelling, cApitALiZaTiOn, and punctuation are correct. Then try reloading the page." will display.

settings.label: Speak To Help Text
settings.info: No Results page help text for Speak to our exper, default "Speak to one of our ridiculously helpful Experts and they'll scour our product list for what you need (even if it's not on our website)." will display.
